item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $114,000
item.description: Update: On August 20th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin witnessed a rebound and exceeded $114,000, with a 24-hour price fluctuation of 0.07%.

item.title: The Federal Reserve is studying the application of tokenization and artificial intelligence in the payments field
item.description: On August 20th, Federal Reserve Governor Waller stated that the Federal Reserve is conducting research on the application of tokenization and artificial intelligence in the payment field. Additionally, the Federal Reserve can gain advantages from increased engagement with innovators. (FX168)

item.title: New York Judge Orders EminiFX Cryptocurrency Fraud Case Mastermind to Pay $228 Million Fine
item.description: On August 20th, as per TheBlock report, in 2022, the CFTC alleged that a New York man named Eddy Alexandre and his company EminiFX had raised $59 million from thousands of users for forex and cryptocurrency trading and had misappropriated a significant amount of funds. This Tuesday, New York District Judge Valerie Caproni approved the Commodity Futures Trading Commission's motion for a default judgment, mandating that defendants Alexandre and EminiFX make a joint and several payment of approximately $228 million in restitution and return $15.0495 million in illegal gains. The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York stated that Alexandre also faced criminal charges, had entered a plea of guilty, and had been sentenced to nine years in prison.

item.title: Ronin Ecosystem Metaverse Project PFVS Surges to $0.014 in a Short Time, Marking a 45% 24-Hour Gain
item.description: On August 20th, based on Bybit market data, the Ronin ecosystem's metaverse project PFVS briefly surged to $0.014 and is currently trading at $0.011. It has seen a 45% increase in the past 24 hours and has been consistently at the top of the gainers list this month.

item.title: Rialo: The Club is now open, and eligible members can access it early.
item.description: On August 20th, the new blockchain Rialo announced that its Club has now opened, and eligible members can obtain early access and become Rialo Club members.Previously, on August 2nd, the crypto startup Subzero Labs completed a $20 million seed round of funding with Pantera Capital taking the lead. Subzero Labs intends to launch a new blockchain named Rialo which is targeted at real-world applications. Rialo is not a conventional Layer 1 blockchain â€” Adepoju stated that it is "not Layer 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6," and he is reluctant to make analogies to existing crypto products. Rialo is designed for developers without a crypto background, enabling engineers to build on the blockchain what is usually achievable only off-chain. For instance, it can access off-chain data without an oracle, like FICO credit scores.

item.title: WSJ: Trump May Seek to Fire Fed Chair Powell
item.description: On August 20th, according to a report in "The Wall Street Journal", Trump might attempt to dismiss Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook, who is accused of mortgage fraud.This evening earlier, U.S. Department of Justice officials stated that they have received a criminal investigation referral related to Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook and are treating it with great seriousness. Trump's staunch ally, Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte, wrote to DOJ officials, suggesting that Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook may have committed a crime. According to a copy of the letter disclosed by Bloomberg, the letter alleges that Cook "falsified bank documents and financial records in order to obtain more favorable loan terms, potentially violating criminal laws constituting mortgage fraud."

item.title: Cryptoquant: Strategy Accumulation Not Necessarily a Sign of Bottoming Out, but Aligns with Market Momentum and Boosts Sentiment
item.description: On August 20th, Cryptoquant issued a market analysis indicating that the buy orders of Strategy do not always match the local bottoms and boost the price of BTC. Generally, they purchase OTC and settle on-chain in batches. Sometimes this practice is in line with market momentum, boosting market sentiment, but the market depth far exceeds any single transaction.The best way to interpret the buy orders of Strategy is to regard their purchases as part of the demand background and then confirm through ETF flows, spot CVD, and the Coinbase premium on the US trading platform.

item.title: A certain new address withdrew approximately 234,000 UNI and 485.77 ETH from Binance
item.description: On August 20th, as per the monitoring of OnchainLens, a newly established address withdrew 234,083 UNI from Binance, which was valued at $2.35 million; in addition, it also withdrew 485.77 ETH, with a value of $2 million.

item.title: Capital Economics: Market Overestimating Fed Rate Cut Prospects, US Short-Term Rates Face Upside Risk
item.description: On August 20th, Kevin Thozet, a member of the TCW Group Macro Investment Committee, stated in a report that there are upward risks to the US short-term interest rate, and the market is overly confident about the prospects of the Fed's interest rate cuts. The US money market has already priced in at least two interest rate cuts this year, which reflects the market's expectation that signs of a further slowdown in the US economy and inflation will emerge. Thozet said: "Considering the resilience of the US economy, policy uncertainty, and the persistence of inflation pressure, we believe this expectation is too high." The trend of long-term US Treasury bond yields is more balanced. The current 10-year US Treasury bond yield at 4.300% is expected to fluctuate within a range of approximately 50 basis points above and below the current level. (FXStreet)

item.title: If Ethereum drops below $4,000, the cumulative long liquidation pressure from major CEXs will reach $1.841 billion
item.description: On August 20th, based on Coinglass data, if Ethereum drops below $4000, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX in terms of long positions will reach $1.841 billion.On the other hand, if Ethereum rebounds above $4300, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEX in terms of short positions will reach $1.88 billion.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not display the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the precise value of the contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, the intensity. Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be impacted when it reaches a certain position. Higher "liquidation bars" indicate that the price will have a more pronounced reaction due to a liquidity cascade when it reaches that point.
